name: Eleven Table Tennis
detailed_description:
The ultimate Table Tennis simulator. Play opponents from around the world or hone your skills by playing a match against our AI.

We're obsessed with creating the most realistic VR table tennis simulation the world has ever seen. After countless hours of hard work and support from our amazing community, we believe that we accomplished that goal.

We hope that you enjoy playing Eleven as much as we enjoy working on it. If you run into any issues or if you're interested in joining our ever-growing community of table tennis fanatics, follow the link in the additional details section and join us on our discord.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Play over Oculus Link/AirLink/Virtual Desktop Not Recommended: the tracking will be much worse
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

short_description: We're obsessed with creating the most realistic VR table tennis simulator the world has ever seen. After 5 years and countless hours of hard work, we believe that we have accomplished that goal.: : : [Play over Oculus Link/AirLink/Virtual Desktop Not Recommended: the tracking will be much worse]
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Czech, Dutch, Hungarian, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970, or AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR. Standing or Room Scale

package_groups.name: subscriptions
package_groups.title: Buy Eleven Table Tennis Subscription Plan
package_groups.description: To be billed on a recurring basis.

subs.option_description: $29.99 at checkout, auto-renewed every 1 month(s) at $29.99.
